name: Pajama Sam's Lost & Found
description: Climb aboard and join Pajama Sam as he jumps and glides through wild worlds, collecting toys, and dodging dangers along the way!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Процессор: 1.0 GHz Processor Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Место на диске: 512 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 10 Процессор: 1.5 GHz Processor Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Место на диске: 512 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: This game has changed my life. Before i got this game i was a weak beta who only managed to scrape through life by the skin of my teeth. I was 5'6 and weighed 300 pounds and had more grease in my hair than a McDonalds deep fryer. No girl would touch me, i was nothing. That all changed when Pajama Sam came into my life. His sheer determination to find all of his lost items inspired me to change my life. I forced my self to grow till i was 6,5, i then started to work out and got a body that causes women to ♥♥♥♥♥♥ at the sight of me. Pajama Sam has made me a better person.   Pajama Sam is Love  Pajama Sam is Life   11/10  Would Bang.
Great game. Needs a save. Dont care for passcodes. works on windows 10. Hopefully it works forever.
